君子一言，駟馬難追.pinyin: jūn zi yī yán ， sì mǎ nán zhuī
君子一言，駟馬難追.definition: a nobleman's word is his bond (proverb)

君子不計小人過.pinyin: jūn zi bù jì xiǎo rén guò
君子不計小人過.definition: see 大人不記小人過|大人不记小人过[da4 ren2 bu4 ji4 xiao3 ren2 guo4]

君子之交.definition: friendship between gentlemen, insipid as water (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3])

君子之交淡如水.pinyin: jūn zi zhī jiāo dàn rú shuǐ
君子之交淡如水.definition: a gentleman's friendship, insipid as water (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3])

君子動口不動手.pinyin: jūn zi dòng kǒu bù dòng shǒu
君子動口不動手.definition: a gentleman uses his mouth and not his fist

君子坦蕩蕩，小人長戚戚.pinyin: jūn zi tǎn dàng dàng ， xiǎo rén zhǎng qī qī
君子坦蕩蕩，小人長戚戚.definition: good people are at peace with themselves, (but) there is no rest for the wicked

君子報仇，十年不晚.pinyin: jūn zi bào chóu ， shí nián bù wǎn
君子報仇，十年不晚.definition: lit. for a nobleman to take revenge, ten years is not too long (idiom); fig. revenge is a dish best served cold

君子遠庖廚.definition: lit. a nobleman stays clear of the kitchen (idiom, from Mencius); fig. a nobleman who has seen a living animal cannot bear to see it die, hence he keeps away from the kitchen

君山.definition: Junshan district of Yueyang city 岳陽|岳阳[Yue4 yang2], Hunan

君山區.definition: Junshan district of Yueyang city 岳陽|岳阳[Yue4 yang2], Hunan

君長.definition: the monarch and his ministers; tribal chief
